message: LucidChart makes diagraming, flowcharts and mindmapping simple and painless. You can even collaborate with other users and work on charts, flowcharts and mindmaps together. Sign up at https://www.lucidchart.com/

Teambox is a great tool for collaborative projects. It takes the best of social networking, and throws some awesome productivity tools on top of it, allowing you to better manage your work flow, track project progress, and even track your time. Sign up at https://teambox.com/?rf=118350

ManyMoon is very similiar to TeamBox in many ways. It offers a similiar toolkit but with a much different user interface. It allows you to easily share documents, track tasks and provides a time sheet tool. Sign up at http://www.manymoon.com/
